firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of pairs of neighbouring evil players.
name: Swimming Pro
ability: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

otherNightReminder: If the Programmer died tonight: The Programmer points to a player. Show that player’s character token.
name: Programmer
ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

firstNightReminder: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
name: Literary Girl
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

otherNightReminder: If a player was executed today: Show that player’s character token.
name: Clairvoyant
ability: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbors of the Moral Compass.
otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbors of the Moral Compass.
name: Moral Compass
ability: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

firstNightReminder: The Detective points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Mastermind.
otherNightReminder: The Detective points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Mastermind.
name: Detective
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: you learn if either is the Mastermind. There is a good player that registers as the Mastermind to you.

name: Baseball Star
ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Classmate, they are executed immediately.

firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Traitor in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
name: Gambler
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Traitor.

firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Classmate in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
name: Pop Star
ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Classmate.

name: Hope
ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Martial Artist points to a player not themself. Mark that player 'Protected'.
name: Martial Artist
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself). They are safe from the Mastermind tonight.

name: Biker Leader
ability: You are safe from the Mastermind.

name: Affluent Progeny
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Mastermind, they die.

name: Robot
ability: You do not know you are the Robot. You think you are a Classmate character, but you are not.

name: Serial Killer
ability: You might register as evil & as a Traitor or Mastermind, even if dead.

name: Headmaster
ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.

name: Fanfic Creator
firstNightReminder: The Fanfic Creator points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
otherNightReminder: The Fanfic Creator points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

name: Confectioner
firstNightReminder: The Confectioner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Confectioner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

name: Soldier
otherNightReminder: If the Soldier became the Mastermind today: Show the 'You are' card, then the demon token.
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Mastermind dies, you become the Mastermind. (Travellers don’t count)

name: Spy
firstNightReminder: Show the Yearbook to the Spy for as long as they need.
otherNightReminder: Show the Yearbook to the Spy for as long as they need.
ability: Each night, you see the Yearbook. You might register as good & as a Classmate or Outsider, even if dead.

name: Scout
ability: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

otherNightReminder: The Mastermind points to a player. That player dies. If the Mastermind chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive Traitor with a spare Mastermind token. Show the 'You are' card, then the Mastermind token.
name: Mastermind
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Traitor becomes the Mastermind.
